title: Brody's First Time
description: Brody always knew he was gay, yet he failed to admit it, even to himself.After becoming stranded under a tiki bar during a thunderstorm on the beach, Brody meets Charlie, an older man who the very sight of brings undeniable joy to Brody. Charlie invites Brody up to his room to ride out the storm. Brody takes Charlie up on his offer, and in the minutes that follow Brody discovers what he had been missing out on in life. And most importantly, admitting to himself who he is.
author: Damien Wynn
